item.title: 南非看到欧洲债券回归的 "甜蜜点
item.description: 南非财政部副部长表示，投资者情绪的改善为南非重返欧元债券市场创造了机会。【原文：South Africa’s deputy finance minister said improved investor sentiment has created an opportunity for the country to return to the eurobond market.】

item.title: 泰国斥资 150 亿美元推进停滞项目以刺激经济增长
item.description: 泰国打赌，加快推进 4,800 亿泰铢（约合 148 亿美元）的停滞投资项目将有助于支持经济发展势头，因为泰国正努力与本地区其他国家争夺外国资本。【原文：Thailand is betting that speeding up 480 billion baht ($14.8 billion) in stalled investment projects will help support economic momentum as it races to compete with regional peers for foreign capital.】

item.title: 核电输出强劲，法国电力出口创 20 年新高
item.description: 由于核电和可再生能源的强劲输出，法国在 7 月至 10 月期间出口了至少二十年来最多的电力。【原文：France exported the most electricity in at least two decades from July to October due to strong nuclear and renewables output.】

item.title: 比利时达成预算协议，避免政治动荡
item.description: 比利时五党联盟周一早些时候达成预算协议，避免了政府垮台的可能，并在未来几周的几项关键决策前确保了一些急需的政治稳定。【原文：Belgium’s five-party coalition sealed a budget deal early on Monday, averting a possible government collapse and securing some much-needed political stability before several key decisions in the coming weeks.】

item.title: 乌克兰债券受和谈影响引领东欧资产走高
item.description: 有迹象表明，美国支持的和平计划取得了进展，可能会在近四年后停止战斗，此后乌克兰的美元债券跳涨，东欧货币走强。【原文：Ukraine’s dollar bonds jumped and east European currencies strengthened after signs of progress toward a US-backed peace plan that may halt the fighting after almost four years.】

item.title: 中国机器人出租车竞赛势头强劲，WeRide 减少损失
item.description: WeRide公司第三季度净亏损因机器人出租车订单增加而收窄，该公司正在争夺日益增长的全球无人驾驶出租车市场。【原文：WeRide Inc. narrowed its third-quarter net loss on increased robotaxi orders, as it races for a slice of the growing global market for driverless cabs.】

item.title: ING 完成两笔与 105 亿欧元企业贷款相关的特别储备信托计划
item.description: ING Groep NV 完成了与价值 105 亿欧元（121 亿美元）的企业贷款相关的两项重大风险转移，提高了其资本缓冲能力。【原文：ING Groep NV has completed two significant risk transfers linked to €10.5 billion ($12.1 billion) worth of corporate loans, boosting its capital buffer.】

item.title: 德国商业前景意外下滑，为经济反弹蒙上阴影
item.description: 德国企业信心在 11 月份意外下滑，这是一个新的迹象，表明即使政府增加支出，也难以克服经济停滞的挑战。【原文：German business confidence unexpectedly dipped in November, a fresh sign of the challenge to overcome stagnation even as the government ramps up spending.】

item.description: 雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）谈五大力量造就历史性时刻【原文：Ray Dalio on the Five Forces Making This a Historical Moment】

item.title: 欧洲央行称稳定币繁荣需要密切监控风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行表示，尽管金融稳定风险目前看来有限，但近期稳定币的繁荣需要密切关注。【原文：The recent boom in stablecoins requires close monitoring, even if financial stability risks appear limited for now, the European Central Bank said.】

item.title: 腾讯完成 11.6 亿欧元投资后育碧股价大涨
item.description: 育碧娱乐公司（Ubisoft Entertainment SA）的股价创下近一年来的最大涨幅，此前该公司与腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd.）达成了一项对卓越工作室（Vantage Studios）的投资协议，卓越工作室是为《刺客信条》（Assassin's Creed）、《孤岛惊魂》（Far Cry）和《汤姆-克兰西：彩虹六号》（Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six）特许经营权而成立的部门。【原文：Ubisoft Entertainment SA’s shares jumped by the most in nearly a year after the company closed a deal with Tencent Holdings Ltd. for an investment in Vantage Studios, a unit carved out for its Assassin’s Creed, Far Cry and Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six franchises.】

item.title: 投资者撤资 35 亿美元，比特币基金将迎来最糟糕的一个月
item.description: 投资于比特币的交易所交易基金将迎来自近两年前推出以来资金流出最严重的一个月，这给疲软的加密货币市场带来了更大的压力。【原文：Exchange-traded funds investing in Bitcoin are heading for their worst month of outflows since launching nearly two years ago, piling yet more pressure on a jaded crypto market.】

item.title: 迪拜因连接问题推迟开市
item.description: 由于连接问题，周一上午迪拜的交易延迟了近三个小时。【原文：Trading in Dubai was delayed by nearly three hours Monday morning due to connectivity issues.】

item.title: 中国玉米价格创两个月新高，雨水灾害引发担忧
item.description: 中国的玉米价格升至两个多月来的最高点，因为买家在大雨过后急于获得优质供应。【原文：Corn rose to the highest in more than two months in China, as buyers rushed to secure good-quality supplies after heavy rains.】

item.title: 美联储鸽派言论和拜耳推动欧洲股市上涨
item.description: 欧洲股市上涨，原因是美联储的鸽派言论以及有关英伟达公司可能向中国销售芯片的早期谈判提振了市场情绪。拜耳公司（Bayer AG）在公布了有希望的研究结果后反弹。【原文：European stocks gained as sentiment was lifted by dovish Federal Reserve comments and early talks about potential Nvidia Corp. chip sales to China. Bayer AG rallied after releasing promising study results.】

item.title: 废料堆积如山，印尼大型镍厂削减产量
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印尼最重要镍矿产地的一家中方控股工厂正在削减产量，因为其尾矿场已接近饱和，这凸显了该行业日益严峻的废物管理挑战。【原文：A majority Chinese-owned plant at Indonesia’s most important nickel site is cutting back production as its tailings site is nearly full, according to people familiar with the matter, highlighting the industry’s growing waste management challenge.】

item.title: 赌场削减 43% 债务，向股东寻求资金
item.description: Guichard Perrachon SA 赌场在商讨加强财务的计划时，目标是减记 43% 的债务，并寻求大股东注入新的资金。【原文：Casino Guichard Perrachon SA is targeting a 43% debt writedown and seeking a fresh capital injection from its majority shareholder as it negotiates a plan to strengthen its finances.】

item.title: 北美出口强劲，液化天然气运价延续涨势
item.description: 液化天然气油轮的现货运价继续飙升，因为北美创纪录的出口量占用了更多的船只。【原文：Spot freight rates for liquefied natural gas tankers extended a surge as record-breaking exports from North America tied up more vessels.】

item.title: 香港领导人就台湾言论质疑与日本的关系
item.description: 香港行政长官李约瑟对与日本交流的价值表示怀疑，这使这个亚洲金融中心与北京在台湾争端后对东京的广泛降温保持一致。【原文：Hong Kong Chief Executive John Lee cast doubt on the value of exchanges with Japan, bringing the Asian financial hub in line with Beijing’s broad cooling with Tokyo following a dispute over Taiwan.】

item.title: 莫迪计划在议会发动改革闪电战以推动经济发展
item.description: 总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）领导的政府计划在即将召开的议会会议上通过十几项重要法案，以加快改革和促进投资。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s government plans to push through a dozen major bills in the upcoming parliament session to speed up reforms and boost investments.】

item.title: 据说泰国加密货币交易所 Bitkub 考虑在香港上市
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，泰国加密货币交易所 Bitkub 正在考虑在香港进行首次公开募股，这有可能提升香港作为数字资产中心的地位。【原文：Thai cryptocurrency exchange Bitkub is considering an initial public offering in Hong Kong, people familiar with the matter said, potentially boosting the city’s status as a digital-assets hub.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油在美国制裁后以超低折扣提供给印度
item.description: 在美国对顶级生产商俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）和卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）实施制裁破坏了利润丰厚的贸易之后，俄罗斯的旗舰产品乌拉尔原油正以至少两年来最便宜的价格提供给印度的炼油商。【原文：Russia’s flagship Urals crude is being offered to India’s refiners at the cheapest price in at least two years after US sanctions on top producers Rosneft PJSC and Lukoil PJSC upended a lucrative trade.】

item.title: 中国 10 月份太阳能发电新增装机延续复苏态势
item.description: 中国太阳能电池板安装量在 8 月份跌至近三年低点后，10 月份继续回升。【原文：China’s solar panel installations continued their recovery in October after falling to near a three-year low in August.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 Lunate 公司考虑出资 10 亿美元收购人工智能公司 MGX
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿布扎比资产管理公司 Lunate 正在讨论向国家支持的人工智能投资者 MGX 投资多达 10 亿美元。【原文：Abu Dhabi asset manager Lunate is in discussions to commit as much as $1 billion to state-backed artificial intelligence investor MGX, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 进口激增，寒流缓解，欧洲天然气跌破 30 欧元
item.description: 欧洲天然气一年多来首次跌破每兆瓦时 30 欧元，原因是一系列利空因素拖累市场走低，其中包括进口增加以及有关结束俄罗斯乌克兰战争的讨论。【原文：European natural gas dropped below €30 a megawatt-hour for the first time in more than a year as a confluence of bearish factors dragged the market lower, including an increase in imports and discussions about ending Russia’s war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 人工智能初创公司融资 7500 万美元，接手初级银行家的粗活
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 Model ML 募集到 7500 万美元，该公司希望通过开发技术来取代投资银行家的大部分繁重工作，包括制作投资方案和编写尽职调查报告。【原文：The artificial intelligence startup Model ML raised $75 million as it looks to develop technology to replace much of the grunt work done by investment bankers — from creating pitch decks to working up due-diligence reports.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数将迎来第三天上涨
Prosus 因电子商务增长和出售部分腾讯股份而实现利润增长
item.description: Prosus NV 因电子商务业务收入增加和出售其在中国腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd. ）的部分股份而实现利润增长。【原文：Prosus NV posts a rise in profit off the back of higher revenue from its e-commerce business and the sale of some of its stake in China’s Tencent Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 瑞银的中国房地产乐观主义者现在预测中国房地产将持续低迷
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）中国房地产研究主管、长期以来的逆向思维者林俊杰（John Lam）正在从他早先的看涨观点中退却，并与华尔街同行一起预测，中国房地产长达四年的低迷期远未结束。【原文：John Lam, UBS Group AG’s head of China property research and a longtime contrarian, is retreating from his earlier bullish calls and joining his Wall Street peers in predicting that the country’s four-year real estate downturn is far from over.】
